#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int p=n;
		if(p%7==0)
		cout<<p<<endl;
		
		else 
		{
			while(p>0)
			{
				if((p-4)%7==0 && (p-4)>0)
				{
					cout<<p-4<<endl;
					break;
				}
				else p=p-4;
			}
			if(p==0)
			cout<<0<<endl;
			else if(p<0) cout<<-1<<endl;
		}
		
	}
}
